source.b102623d:
##### variance
– variance is the amount by which something changes or is different from something else
##### skewness
– skewness is the amount by which something changes or is different from something else
##### kurtosis
– kurtosis refers to the pointedness of a peak in the distribution curve.
##### entropy 
– entropy is the measure of disorder or uncertainty
